uk.ac.glasgow.clui

Class SystemCommand<Facade>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.glasgow.clui.SystemCommand<Facade>
  • Type Parameters:
    Facade - the underlying system (represented by a facade interface) to which commands will be passed.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptOfferCommand, ApproveOfferCommand, AssignAcademicVisitorCommand, LoginCommand, PublishAdvertisementCommand, RecordVisitAssessmentCommand, RegisterEmployerCommand, SubmitAdvertisementCommand, UnknownSystemCommand, ViewAdvertisementDetailCommand, ViewAdvertisementSummaryCommand, ViewStudentDetailCommand, ViewStudentSummaryCommand

    public abstract class SystemCommand<Facade>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract contract for specifying system commands.
    Author:
    tws

    • Method Detail

      • processCommand

        public abstract void processCommand(java.lang.String... arguments)
                             throws SystemCommandException
        Causes this command to be invoked on the facade provided at construction. Implementations of this method will format the arguments presented at the command line for invocation on the specified facade.
        Parameters:
        arguments - string representation of arguments to be passed to the command at the facade.
        Throws:
        SystemCommandException - if the arguments are malformed, or if the system is in an invalid state for the specified command.
